title: Drop a Gear and Disappear
description: They tried to make me disappear. I thought I had found the brotherhood I had been searching for. A club to fill the nagging void. Till they took the woman I loved and left me for dead. They may have her now, but things are about to change. Vengeance will be mine. You’ve read the novella in the Wanted Anthology, but Drop a Gear and Disappear is back and better than ever. Prepare to ride with the Kings of Vengeance.
author: Winter Travers
